title: How to Oil Hair Effectively Before Washing

steps.title: Choose an oil which you want to apply; coconut, olive, castor, etc.
steps.content: Choose an oil which you want to apply; coconut, olive, castor, etc.

steps.title: Warm the oil slightly.
steps.content: Warm the oil slightly. Do not heat it too much or you'll burn your hand or scalp.

steps.title: Dip your finger tips in the warm oil and apply the oil to the roots of the hair in circular motion.
steps.content: Dip your finger tips in the warm oil and apply the oil to the roots of the hair in circular motion. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Do this to the entire scalp.
steps.content: Do this to the entire scalp.

steps.title: After applying oil to the entire scalp, apply oil to the rest of the hair till the tips.
steps.content: After applying oil to the entire scalp, apply oil to the rest of the hair till the tips.

steps.title: Applying oil to the tips is important as it prevents split ends.
steps.content: Applying oil to the tips is important as it prevents split ends. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Massage the scalp with finger tips (don't use nails) for 10 minutes to improve circulation.
steps.content: Massage the scalp with finger tips (don't use nails) for 10 minutes to improve circulation.

steps.title: Leave the oil for at least an hour before washing it off.
steps.content: Leave the oil for at least an hour before washing it off. Leaving the oil overnight is even better. [3] X Research source If you are leaving the oil overnight, make sure your hair is covered with a plastic shower cap and wash your hair the next morning.

steps.title: Wash off the oil completely with shampoo.
steps.content: Wash off the oil completely with shampoo.
